trans-unit.source: Provides digital rights management services for encrypting and decrypting protected content.
trans-unit.target: Gir digital rights management-tjenester for kryptering og dekryptering beskyttet innhold.

trans-unit.source: CryptoProvider is created as a result of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A> method when binding a rights managed <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> to a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: CryptoProvider opprettes som et resultat av <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A>metoden ved binding en administrert rettigheter <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A>

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, CryptoProvider is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: Som med andre <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>typer CryptoProvider brukes bare i fullstendig klarering programmer.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>

trans-unit.source: Gets the cipher block size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Henter den cipher blokkstørrelsen, i byte.

trans-unit.source: The `clearText` and `cipherText` buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> must be n*BlockSize bytes in length, where 'n' is an integer greater than or equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: Den `clearText` og `cipherText` buffere sendt til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>og <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>må være n * Blokkstørrelse byte, der "n" er et heltall større enn eller lik 1.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A> is `false`, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> must be the same length as the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>er `false`, bufrer sendt til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>må ha samme lengde som bufferne sendt til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A> is `true`, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> can be a different length from the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> (all buffer sizes must still always be a multiple of BlockSize bytes in length).
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>er `true`, bufrer sendt til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>kan være en annen lengde fra buffere som er sendt til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>(alle bufferstørrelser må fremdeles alltid være et multiplum av Blokkstørrelse byte).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>

trans-unit.source: A BlockSize of 1 indicates that the cipher is a stream cipher; a BlockSize of 2 or greater indicates a block cipher.
trans-unit.target: Blokkstørrelse 1 angir at cipher er en dataflyt chiffrering; Blokkstørrelse 2 eller høyere angir en blokkchiffrering.

trans-unit.source: The cipher block size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Den cipher blokkstørrelsen, i byte.

trans-unit.source: The default block size for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] is 8.
trans-unit.target: Standard blokkstørrelse for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] er 8.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection listing the rights that passed verification and that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling med rettigheter som ble sendt bekreftelse og som er gitt til brukeren.

trans-unit.source: A collection enumerating the rights that passed verification and that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: En samling opplisting av rettigheter som ble sendt bekreftelse, og som er gitt til brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has rights to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om brukeren har rettigheter til å dekryptere.

trans-unit.source: CanDecrypt returns **true** if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> bound to this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> grants the user read access rights such as View, Edit, Print, or Owner.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer CanDecrypt **true** hvis den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>bundet til dette <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>gir brukeren rettigheter for lesetilgang for eksempel Vis, Rediger, Skriv ut eller eieren.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"></xref> grants the user rights to decrypt; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** hvis den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"> </xref> gir brukerrettigheter til å dekryptere; ellers **false**.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has rights to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om brukeren har rettigheter til å kryptere.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A> returns **true** if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> bound to this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> grants the user write access rights such as Edit or Owner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A>Returnerer **true** hvis den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>bundet til dette <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>gir brukeren rettigheter for skrivetilgang for eksempel Rediger eller -eier.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense></xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"></xref> grants the user rights to encrypt; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** hvis den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"> </xref> gir brukerrettigheter til å kryptere; ellers **false**.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*> can accept buffers that are different block sizes in length.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om <> </> *> og <> </> *> godtar buffere som er forskjellig blokker størrelser lang.

trans-unit.source: The `clearText` and `cipherText` buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> must be n*<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes in length, where 'n' is an integer greater than or equal to 1. If CanMergeBlocks is **false**, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> must be the same length as the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>. If CanMergeBlocks is **true**, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> can be a different length from the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> (all buffer sizes must still always be a multiple of <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes in length).
trans-unit.target: Den `clearText` og `cipherText` buffere sendt til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>og <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>må være n* <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> byte, der "n" er et heltall større enn eller lik 1.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> Hvis CanMergeBlocks * *false**, bufrer sendt til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>må ha samme lengde som bufferne sendt til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> Hvis CanMergeBlocks * *true**, bufrer sendt til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>kan være en annen lengde fra buffere som er sendt til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>(alle bufferstørrelser fortsatt alltid må være et multiplum av <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>byte).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the buffer passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> can be a different length from the buffer passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*>; otherwise, **false** if the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*> must be the exact same length.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** Hvis bufferen som ble sendt til <> </> *> kan være en annen lengde fra bufferen som ble sendt til <> </> *>; ellers **false** Hvis bufferne sendt til <> </> *> og <> </> *> må ha nøyaktig samme lengde.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] the default is **true**.
trans-unit.target: For [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] standard **true**.

trans-unit.source: Decrypts cipher text to clear text.
trans-unit.target: Dekrypterer cipher tekst for å fjerne tekst.

trans-unit.source: The cipher text to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Sifferkodetekst dekryptere.

trans-unit.source: The decrypted clear text of cryptoText.
trans-unit.target: Den dekrypterte klartekst av cryptoText .

trans-unit.source: cipherText is null.
trans-unit.target: cipherTexter null.

trans-unit.source: Decryption right not granted.
trans-unit.target: Dekryptering akkurat ikke gitt.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Dispose performs <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Avhending utfører <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>ble bruker.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()`metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>referanser.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Encrypts clear text to cipher text.
trans-unit.target: Krypterer ren tekst for å cipher tekst.

trans-unit.source: The byte length of the `clearText` buffer should be a multiple of the cipher <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Byte lang den `clearText` bufferen må være et multiplum av cipher <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The digital rights management system uses [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] block cipher.
trans-unit.target: Digitalt rights management system bruker [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] blokker cipher.

trans-unit.source: With [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-aes-md.md)], blocks are encrypted independently such that two blocks of identical clear text produce identical cipher text results.
trans-unit.target: Med [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-aes-md.md)], som er kryptert uavhengig slik at to blokker med identiske klartekst gi identiske cipher teksten resultater.

trans-unit.source: To minimize potential decryption threats from independent block encryption, applications should employ methods to modify content, such as compression, to avoid encrypting identical clear text blocks.
trans-unit.target: For å minimere potensielle trusler for dekryptering fra uavhengige block-kryptering, må programmer bruker metodene for å endre innholdet, for eksempel komprimering for å unngå kryptering identiske klartekst blokker.

trans-unit.source: The clear text content to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i ren tekst for å kryptere.

trans-unit.source: Encrypted cipher text of the given clearText.
trans-unit.target: Kryptert sifferkodetekst for den angitte clearText .

trans-unit.source: clearText is null.
trans-unit.target: clearTexter null.

trans-unit.source: Encryption is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: Kryptering er ikke tillatt.

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs internal cleanup before the instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Frigjør ressurser og utfører intern opprydding før forekomsten gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Finalize performs <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Fullfør utfører <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Applikasjons-koden kan ikke kalle denne metoden. et objekts `Finalize` metode startes automatisk under datasanering, med mindre finalization av saneringsoppsamlingen er deaktivert av et kall til den <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>metoden.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [fullføre metoder og destruktører](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), og [overstyrer metoden fullføre](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
